snippet.title: Tiny Football Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Tiny Football now: https://bit.ly/3wXD1wt

Find out more at:
https://www.microprose.com/games/tiny-football/
https://discord.gg/xyWqGak

Tiny Football is a throw back to old top-down retro soccer games of the 90's. Simple, one button gameplay yet still able to provide a rich football experience with accurate passing and shooting, tackles, crosses, throw balls, overhead kicks, free kicks and more.
